articles.title: Broadcom (AVGO) Upgraded by Japanese Firm
articles.description: Japanese investment bank Daiwa Securities raised its rating on Broadcom (AVGO) stock to Buy from Outperform today, Schwab Network reported. articles.title: Wall Street ends up, but Trump tariff speech sends futures lower
articles.original_title: Wall Street ends up, but Trump tariff speech sends futures lower
articles.description: U.S. stock indexes closed higher amid choppy trading as investors positioned themselves ahead of President Trump's sweeping tariff announcements. Post-market, S&P 500 and Nasdaq futures fell sharply. Trump's tariffs include a 10% baseline on all imports and higher duties for key partners. Tesla and big-tech stocks showed gains, while CoreWeave recovered despite Newsmax plummeting.
articles.snippet: U.S. stock indexes closed higher amid choppy trading as investors positioned themselves ahead of President Trump's sweeping tariff announcements. Post-market, S&P 500 and Nasdaq futures fell sharply. Trump's tariffs include a 10% baseline on all imports and higher duties for key partners. Tesla and big-tech stocks showed gains, while CoreWeave recovered despite Newsmax plummeting.

articles.title: Amazon submits bid for TikTok with U.S. sale deadline nearing
articles.original_title: Amazon submits bid for TikTok with U.S. sale deadline nearing
articles.description: Amazon.com Inc. submitted a bid to the White House to purchase the social video app TikTok from its Chinese owners. Find out more
articles.snippet: Amazon.com Inc. submitted a bid to the White House to purchase the social video app TikTok from its Chinese owners. Find out more.

articles.title: Amazon Submits Bid For TikTok With US Sale Deadline Nearing
articles.original_title: Amazon Submits Bid For TikTok With US Sale Deadline Nearing
articles.description: Amazon.com Inc. submitted a bid to the White House to purchase the social video app TikTok from its Chinese owners, according to a person familiar with the matter. The company sent its proposal in a letter to Vice President JD Vance, who’s heading efforts to help facilitate a sale of the US operations of the video platform ahead of a deadline later this week, and Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick, the people said.
articles.snippet: Amazon.com Inc. submitted a bid to the White House to purchase the social video app TikTok from its Chinese owners, according to a person familiar with the matter. The company sent its proposal in a letter to Vice President JD Vance, who’s heading efforts to help facilitate a sale of the US operations of the video platform ahead of a deadline later this week, and Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick, the people said.

articles.original_title: US Stock Futures Tumble As Trump Imposes 10% Global Tariff

articles.title: Asian stocks drop, bonds jump as Trump tariffs sap risk
articles.original_title: Asian stocks drop, bonds jump as Trump tariffs sap risk
articles.description: S&P 500 futures sank over 3.5% while contracts on the Nasdaq 100 slid 4.5%. Shares in Australia, Japan and South Korea tumbled at the open Thursday. US 10-year Treasury yields slumped with the flight to havens also lifting the Japanese yen and gold, which touched a new record high.
articles.snippet: S&P 500 futures sank over 3.5% while contracts on the Nasdaq 100 slid 4.5%. Shares in Australia, Japan and South Korea tumbled at the open Thursday. US 10-year Treasury yields slumped with the flight to havens also lifting the Japanese yen and gold, which touched a new record high.
